languages.text:
At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of the combat, the wearer inflicts bleeding (5) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area melee attack, they inflict bleeding (3) on all hit creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +<u>(5 × wearer's bleeding level)% additional damage.

At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +<u>(5 × wearer's bleeding level)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +<u>(5 × wearer's bleeding level)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text:
战斗开始时，装备者自身获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）效果。
当装备者进行使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}发动区域攻击时，会对所有{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的生物施加流血（4）。
此次近战攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}%。
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
战斗开始时，装备者自身获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（5）效果。
当装备者进行使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}发动区域攻击时，会对所有{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}的生物施加流血（3）。
此次近战攻击造成的伤害提高<u>（5×装备者流血等级）</u>%。

战斗开始时，装备者自身获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）效果。
当装备者进行使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}发动区域攻击时，会对所有{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的生物施加流血（4）。
此次近战攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}%。

languages.text:
В начале боя персонаж накладывает на себя {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (4).
Совершая атаку {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием по области, персонаж накладывает кровотечение (4) на все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}.
Также эта атака наносит +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
В начале боя персонаж накладывает на себя кровотечение (5).
Совершая атаку рукопашным оружием по области, персонаж накладывает кровотечение (3) на все цели.
Также эта атака наносит +<u>(5 × уровень эффекта кровотечения персонажа)% дополнительного урона.

В начале боя персонаж накладывает на себя кровотечение (5).
Совершая атаку рукопашным оружием по области, персонаж накладывает кровотечение (3) на все цели.
Также эта атака наносит +<u>(5 × уровень эффекта кровотечения персонажа)% дополнительного урона.

В начале боя персонаж накладывает на себя {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (4).
Совершая атаку {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием по области, персонаж накладывает кровотечение (4) на все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}.
Также эта атака наносит +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

languages.text:
戦闘開始時、使用者は自らに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g} (4) を付与する。
使用者が範囲{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行うたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した生物すべてに出血 (4) を付与する。
この範囲近接攻撃でさらに{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘開始時、使用者は自らに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g} (5) を付与する。
使用者が範囲{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}を行うたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した生物すべてに出血 (3) を与える。
この範囲近接攻撃でさらに<u>(5 ×使用者の出血レベル)</u>％の追加ダメージを与える。

戦闘開始時、使用者は自らに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g} (4) を付与する。
使用者が範囲{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行うたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した生物すべてに出血 (4) を付与する。
この範囲近接攻撃でさらに{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text:
Al inicio del combate, el portador se provoca {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4).
Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en área, causa hemorragia (4) a todas las criaturas {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactadas{/g}.
Este ataque cuerpo a cuerpo en área también causa +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Al inicio del combate, el portador se provoca {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (5).
Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en área, causa hemorragia (3) a todas las criaturas {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactadas{/g}.
Este ataque cuerpo a cuerpo en área también causa +<u>(5 × nivel de hemorragia del portador)</u> % de daño adicional.

Al inicio del combate, el portador se provoca {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4).
Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en área, causa hemorragia (4) a todas las criaturas {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactadas{/g}.
Este ataque cuerpo a cuerpo en área también causa +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.

languages.text:
Zu Beginn des Kampfes verursacht der Träger bei sich selbst {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4).
Wenn der Träger einen Flächen-{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} ausführt, verursacht er Blutung (4) bei allen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Kreaturen.
Dieser Flächen-Nahkampfangriff verursacht außerdem +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5} % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Zusatzschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn des Kampfes verursacht der Träger bei sich selbst {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (5).
Immer wenn der Träger einen Flächen-{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} ausführt, verursacht er Blutung (3) bei allen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffenen{/g} Kreaturen.
Dieser Flächen-Nahkampfangriff verursacht außerdem +<u>(5 × Blutungsstufe des Trägers)</u> % Zusatzschaden.

Zu Beginn des Kampfes verursacht der Träger bei sich selbst {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4).
Immer wenn der Träger einen Flächen-{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} ausführt, verursacht er Blutung (4) bei allen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Kreaturen.
Dieser Flächen-Nahkampfangriff verursacht außerdem +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5} % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Zusatzschaden{/g}.

languages.text:
Au début du combat, l'utilisateur s'inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (4).
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} de zone, il inflige l'effet Saignement (4) à toutes les créatures {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g}.
Cette attaque de mêlée de zone inflige également +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au début du combat, l'utilisateur s'inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (5).
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} de zone, il inflige l'effet Saignement (3) à toutes les créatures {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchées{/g}.
Cette attaque de mêlée de zone inflige également +<u>(5 × niveau de saignement de l'utilisateur)</u> % de dégâts supplémentaires.

Cette attaque de mêlée de zone inflige également +<u>(5 × niveau de saignement de l'utilisateur)</u> % de dégâts supplémentaires.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} de zone, il inflige l'effet Saignement (4) à toutes les créatures {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g}.
